mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO AS userNO, USER_GROUP_CD AS userGroupCd, LOGIN_ID AS loginId, PSWD AS pswd, RCNT_LOGIN_DT AS rcntLoginDt, PSWD_CHG_DT AS pswdChgDt, PSWD_ERR_CNT AS pswdErrCnt, USER_CLOSE_YN AS userCloseYn FROM USER_INFO WHERE LOGIN_ID = #{loginId}
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET RCNT_LOGIN_DT=SYSDATE WHERE LOGIN_ID=#{loginId}
mapper.select: SELECT ${nameSql} AS "Nm", ${telNoSql} AS "TelNo" FROM ${tableNm} WHERE USER_NO IN( SELECT USER_NO FROM USER_INFO WHERE LOGIN_ID=#{loginId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET PSWD_CHG_DT=SYSDATE WHERE LOGIN_ID=#{userId}
